review.title: “Learned alot, great resume builder with diverse and interesting projects, but company needs to mature.”
review.pros: Pros – Huge variety of projects. Very involved work. Direct control over project outcome. Very flat management structure. Innovation is generally welcome and seen as an accomplishment rather than a problem. Work with major companies providing services.
review.cons: Cons – Immature software processes, lack of in-house software products.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Having more in-house products would wean the company off of depending on service contracts to make money. Paying more attention to tool-chain, rapid development, and developing maintainable solid products rather than concentrating on speed will help in the future.
